subject: Order Greece
description_text:
Hello I want to know if i have to pay any vat or taxes if i ll make order
.  ? I am from Greece . Unless I ll order from aliexpress

conversations.body_text:
But in your site you said for orders > than 150 euro according to EU
regulations, you may need to pay Import VAT and customs duties to your
local customs or logistics provider during the clearance process

Στις Σάβ 29 Νοε 2025, 03:33 ο χρήστης General and sales enquiries <
service@simsonn.com> έγραψε:

> You can place an order on the official website without paying any taxes,
> but orders under 150 euros must pay VAT.
>
>
>
> ----------Reply to Message----------
> On Sat, Nov 29, 2025 08:38 AM Sakis Avramidis<sakisavramidis92@gmail.com>
> wrote:
> Hello I want to know if i have to pay any vat or taxes if i ll make order
> .  ? I am from Greece . Unless I ll order from aliexpress
>
Hi Sakis Avramidis,    As we do not collect VAT on orders exceeding €150.

I make an order . With express shipping.  Will i have to pay any extras
when arrived?

That's great, thank you very much. May i know when will be shipped?
Orders
<https://account.simsonn.com/orders>Order #SSN4114
